fields.value: Be nice. There's no need for insults.
Read the FAQ section on the docs before asking your question. You might as well find the answer you're looking for! https://docs.bentobox.world/.
Don't start tagging random people. Your messages will be answered as soon as possible, just wait.
Don't ask for a helper rank. It'll eventually be given to you if you're active on the #support-en or #support-fr channels.
